subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony’s 50-point game recalled Bernard King’s best nights, but Friday’s celebration of the 1973 N.B.A. champions will recall the Knicks’ best days.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony’s 50-point game recalled Bernard King’s best nights, but Friday’s celebration of the 1973 N.B.A. champions will recall the Knicks’ best days.
